name: Philipp Reiner
headline: researches innovative business models, empowers software teams and always thinks about tomorrow.
subtitle: Strategy & Technology
content:
Hi, I’m Philipp and I work at the intersection of technology and business. I will think ahead, anticipate trends, and break-down complex challenges. Imaging what could be possble excites me. 

Strategically-minded and technically skilled, I drive growth and innovation while collaborating with technical and non-technical individuals. Patience is not my greatest strength but together we can turn ideas into action. 

Today I’m a manager at Accenture. Before that, I supported teams at PlanB, building B2B software. I also co-founded an IIoT startup, where I gained valuable experience in leadership, sales, and product development as our team grew to 15 people. 

Beyond work, I capture moments with my camera, like to drive electric cars, hike, and read about entrepreneurship and science-fiction.
